subject: Re: Urgent Request for Repair of Projector and Replacement of Laptop
body: Dear IT Manager,Good day!Hope this email finds you well. Sir, As you know the SCCD Speaker wing has used the IT Equipements, e.g., Laptops, and projectors daily for official working in Lahore and OS campuses. The travelling and continues movements have damaged the equipment, its wires and its bags etc. The department, has been raised this issue multiple times in the past to provide maintenance and its wear & tear, but no, response received upon our requests. Now a latest request has been generated with the previous request intact. The following gadgets has been required immediately.Already requested:1 projector repair (Handed to the IT and its Token has attached).Latest Request:1 HP Laptop Charger replacement3 projector bags2 laptop bags1 power cable for projector2 VGA cables for projectorNote: Priority is HighThank you for your understanding and cooperation.Kind Regards,SCCD Head Office

subject: RE: Urgent Requirement ‚Äì Renovation & Shifting Plan for 28/B-1 Ground Floor
body: Dear Sir,As per our recent discussion regarding the renovation work at 28-B1 building, you had informed us about the estimated costs as follows:Marble polishing: Rs. 75,000 approxInstallation of new tiles: Rs. 200,000 approxInstallation of new marble: Rs. 350,000 approxI have discussed these options with Respected PSO MD and Respected Manager HR Based on our conversation, you are requested to please proceed with the tile installation option and initiate the remaining work on an urgent basis. However, as agreed, we must keep the overall cost under control without compromising on the quality of materials. If possible, kindly arrange for tiles in a wooden floor shade to enhance the appearance.Best Regard,Muhammad Umer FarooqAssistant Manager HRExt: 249, Mobile:0335-4881207/0340-0009308KIPS Corporate Office | Lahore | Pakistan

subject: Re: Audit Report - KEC Jampur
body: Assalam o alaikum.Respected sir,Hope you are enjoying sound health, It is stated that we have received audit report on 17th of july-2025. In annexure c. Auditor reported 90 students that are unpaid on Erp . As shown in above shaded area of this file. After rechecking it we found many mistakes done by the auditor that shows unprofessionalism by auditor during audit of our campus. I found that 66/90 students are fully paid on Erp according to given report but the auditor mention them without checking. And 24/90 are half fee paid on Erp ( means if they have to pay for two-month one month fee is entered on Erp and other is not entered just because of Erp issue not because of any personal cause)and half not paid . And these cases and amount are shown in above excel sheet according to audit report. This audit report damaged our institutional as well as personal reputation in front of higher officials. Kindly ask the auditor why he did do like this. Kindly reply us. After rechecking of report we find that the missing amount not entered on Erp because of technical Erp issue ( pay two month fee but Erp do not show the last month fee if remain unpaid) we have to pay (178070) total amount .Report is rechecked and reorganized by M Muneeb khan info & admin officer kips jampur.Evidence of paid fee is attached in picture form in front of all students from Erp. And remarks is also written in the end.RegardsHafiz Muhammad Waqas BhattiProject HeadKips Preparation Jampur Campus.

subject: KS Sheikhupura Credit Note till July,2025
body: Dear Sir, I hope this will find you in the best of health. Referred to the subject of this email, we are formally initiating invoice(s) for KIPS Share against the revenue received by your campus during the tenure and categories mentioned in detail. You are requested to please pay through a crossed cheque in favor of Quality Brands (Pvt) Limited. The cheque should be dispatched within the timeline mentioned in the attached invoice. Your timely response will be highly appreciated.Note:Any over/undercharged amount highlighted through audit or any other way will be adjusted in the next invoice of the same year. Regards Zaheer AhmadGeneral Manager

body: Dear Muneeb,This is to inform you that the LCDs and printer have been delivered by me. The LCDs are older models but are fully functional without any issues. The printer has been repaired and tested in the IT Lab.However, the toner cartridge was not provided during the repair, which is causing a limitation in its current usability. Mr. Ashab is looking into this matter.Thank you.Best regards,Irfan AdeemManagerIT | KIPS042-35223058 | 03006895015it.mn@kips.edu.pkwww.kips.edu.pkOn 23-Jul-2025, at 2:59 PM, dc.admin@kips.edu.pk wrote:Dear IT Team As referenced in the email below, it has been observed that the LCDs and printer are not functioning correctly. We kindly request you to re-examine the mentioned IT equipment and extend the necessary support to the campus in resolving this issue. Kind Regards,M Muneeb TahirEDC Office +92 305 4440703Ext. 108
